reviewText: I wish they did a 2nd movie.  This ending is kind of boring but it gets you excited to see the final product of handicaps the show they are working to get together and it's a let down when they get the cast and it ends.  I wish there was more.  And for other people that comment on hard to find.  You can find most movies by troma on there website
I bought this to share with a special education class I teach but it's way to racy to show.  I would even be able to show the previews in my high school class.
NICE JOB I AM GLAD THIS ODDITY WAS AVAILABLEBC I COULDN'T FIND IT ANYWHERE

This movie was hilarious.  I saw this movie in the theaters in New York City and I couldn't stop laughing.  Isaak James has brilliantly mastered the art of humor in a politically incorrect, satirical way, that "you've just GOT to laugh".  A very unique and entertaining movie that will be a great addition to anyone's comedy library.
